attributes.action: cull all pigeons in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How many times have you gone out to your car and found a mess left by an inconsiderate pigeons? 

Pigeons. Often considered a pest or even vermin, owing to concerns that they spread disease, damage property, cause pollution with their excrement, and drive out other bird species. 

I propose a national cull on pigeons until their population numbers are reduced significantly.
